name: FirstDev
description:
Hello to all!

This was one of my first games in my game development history. I was inspired by one of the live tutorials of Blackthornprod and decided to add some other features later. There are a lot of ideas that can be added to the game, but I am working on something bigger.

Thank you to all the Youtube game content creators for helping new developers to learn the basics!!!

PS: Version 2 is the new one!!!
